state.dialog: Such a fine soul must live up to such a fine reputation. You were born with a natural beauty stronger than anything I could give you.
There is no need for thanks, fair one.
A silver lance manifests into the emptiness before you. You thrust it upward in a show of grace as you shieth it on your waist.
That lance is the weapon of your character. It may aid you on your quest if you so choose.

I have summoned you here as the savior of the Below. No one short of myself has ever made it this far unto the Realm of Creation. Your conciousness even just existing here is an anomaly curious enough to dub you as fair as you claim.

I am... a creator. Yours, specifically. I have summoned you as the savior of the Below, another creation that has begun to stray from my design. Being as fair as you say, I trust you to bring peace once again.

The Below is a realm of beings, some quite like yourself. It, like all things, was created. It started as a relatively peaceful place, but after going out on a a bit of a bender and creating 'free will'... Well, things have gotten out of hand, but that's what you're here for.

Creation? How do I say... Well everything is created. By what or whom and where is up for much debate, but for certain, I created you here, In the Realm of Creation: the clay-like beginning-realm for all of my creations. You, fair one, were created to bring peace to the Below once more.
Oh just spendid! Off you go!

You pull yourself away from my voice but find there is nothing else to run towards. There is nothing but us here in the Realm of Creation. As you run further into the expansive whiteness, you find your sanity begin to slip. The endless void of white... Who am I? Who are you? Perhaps I should have summoned another... Goodbye fair one. Goodbye.
